ygData.subject: RE: Question about Augmentation and Rune series.   Also Feedback.
ygData.msgSnippet: It has nothing to do with mana.  I have seen that discription before it is wrong.  You cast the spell on yourself or another player and when you are hit they
ygData.messageBody:
It has nothing to do with mana. I have seen that discription before it is
wrong. You cast the spell on yourself or another player and when you are
hit they take 11 damage. It is like the Thron one for Driud/Ranger and I
dont remember what the one for the Mage is like it does the same thing
though. There was a bug before that if they hit you and died do to that
damage from it the corpse would disappear.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Farr, Robert [mailto:robert.farr@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 1:48 PM
> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Question about Augmentation and Rune series.
> Also Feedback.
>
>
> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> The description I found said something about turning an
> opponent's mana into
> damage against himself. How does that translate to a damage shield? Is the
> description I got just totally off-base?
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jeff Wilkinson [SMTP:wilkie@...]
> > Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 3:48 PM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Question about Augmentation and Rune
> > series. Also Feedback.
> >
> > From: "Jeff Wilkinson" <wilkie@...>
> >
> > It is a Damage shield like the mage one.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 1:28 PM
> > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Question about Augmentation and
> Rune series.
> > > Also Feedback.
> > >
> > >
> > > From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
> > >
> > > hey, what does the feedback spell do? is it high powered DD? i dont
> > > remember it being specific ont he spell list...
> > >
> > > Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on
> > Cazic-Thule
> > >
> > > >
> > > >Has Feedback been fixed yet I know there was a problem if
> the MOB died
> > by
> > > >Feedback the corpse disappeared.
> > > >
